data.title: News and communications
data.meta_description: Find news and communications from government
data.text:
UK statement following Israel’s decision to revoke the diplomatic status of 8 Norwegian diplomats

Updated: 9 August 2024

Letter from the Secretary of State for Transport to CrossCountry about its train service performance.

Updated: 9 August 2024

A statement from Keith Fraser, Chair of the Youth Justice Board (YJB), on the recent violent disorder seen across the UK.

Updated: 9 August 2024

Representation from Liverpool City Council concerning the proposed extension to the intervention and move to a statutory board announced on 8 May 2024.

Updated: 9 August 2024

Letter from Liverpool City Council Commissioners providing an update on the Council's property services.

Updated: 9 August 2024

A copy of the letter sent to Liverpool City Council in which the Minister welcomes the Council establishing and working with the Board and the Ministry.

Updated: 9 August 2024

The United States of America, Canada, the United Kingdom and the European Union have released a joint statement on the 4th anniversary of the fraudulent presidential election in Belarus

Updated: 9 August 2024

The rare dark bordered beauty moth exists at one last known site in England – a military training area near York.

Updated: 9 August 2024

Product defect recall alert for Milprazon Chewable 12.5 mg/125 mg Film-coated Tablets for Dogs Weighing at Least 5 kg Vm 01656/5083 by Krka Ltd.

Updated: 9 August 2024

The UK has demonstrated it's commitment to the Indo-Pacific as a series of major multinational military exercises conclude

Updated: 9 August 2024

More than 150 of the people arrested in connection with this month’s violent disorder have already faced their day in court.

Updated: 9 August 2024

Due to a reduction in UK production of Category 1 steel, the TRA proposes that the quota on imports be varied and increased to a total of 2.9 million tonnes.

Updated: 9 August 2024

We support and sponsor innovation for people working in government analysis. GAD collaborates with the Analysis Function, promoting the value of innovation.

Updated: 9 August 2024

The UK and France will soon launch a consultation on the threat presented by the proliferation and irresponsible use of commercial cyber intrusion capabilities.

Updated: 9 August 2024

Ballast container load shift during approach, Belfast International Airport, 9 August 2023

Updated: 9 August 2024

The submission of applications and complaints to the CAC.

Updated: 9 August 2024

Worcester Bosch has committed to change how it markets its boilers to make sure that customers can make well-informed decisions.

Updated: 9 August 2024

MicroCarb is a joint mission between the UK Space Agency and CNES that will measure sources and sinks of carbon, the principal greenhouse gas driving global warming.

Updated: 9 August 2024

Foreign Secretary David Lammy gave a statement welcoming the appointment of an interim government in Bangladesh, led by Professor Muhammad Yunus.

Updated: 9 August 2024
